Fort Greene Express
is the only location in Brooklyn where express testing services are offered in a separate space, making it fast and easy to get routine testing for STIs, including HIV. Fort Greene Express is also the only location in Brooklyn with a Quickie Lab, which provides rapid results for chlamydia and gonorrhea.
Schedule an
appointment for express testing
.
